item.title: Performance
item.description: Performance https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.6/scalability_and_performance/recommended-host-practices.html#recommended-etcd-practices_ How to Use 'fio' to Check Etcd Disk Performance https://access.redhat.com/solutions/4885641 https://access.redhat.com/solutions/4770281 https://www.ibm.com/cloud/blog/using-fio-to-tell-whether-your-storage-is-fast-enough-for-etcd https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_enterprise_linux/7/html/storage_administration_guide/vdo-ev-performance-testing for depth in 1 2 4 8 16 32 64; do fio --rw=write --bs=4096 --name=vdo --filename=/var/lib/etcd/perftest --ioengine=libaio --numjobs=1 --thread --norandommap --runtime=300 --direct=1 --iodepth=$depth --scramble_buffers=1 --offset=0 --size=10g done https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/3.11/scaling_performance/managing_hugepages.html
